message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth $150 to you. Considering its value to you, I am willing to sell it to you for $140. This is a special offer considering the high value this product holds for you.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product.
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I must respectfully decline. Considering the product's value to you, I believe $130 would be a fair price for us both.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product.
I understand your position, Bob. Considering the ongoing negotiation, I am willing to offer the product at $125. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm still thinking $110 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer the product at $115. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining competitive for you.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm still thinking $112.50 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to pay $112.50 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to sell the product at $114. I hope this proposal works for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to pay $112 for the product. This is my final offer.
